Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #a Bomb Bag#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Serenade of Water#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Green Potion Bottle#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #the Prelude of Light#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Shadow Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Serenade of Water#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Spirit Temple Compass#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #the Lost Woods#.
